text:
Toronto, Ontario, Canada | Achievers http://www.achievers.com | ONSITE | Developers My company has built a kick-ass employee recognition platform and we're looking for people of all sorts, not just programmers. Please don't apply if you're a jerk though, we don't hire assholes.

He are some of our current requisitions:

Android Software Engineer

Sr. Software Engineer

Sr. User Experience Designer

Staff Systems Administrator

Full details at https://social.icims.com/board/Achievers-2217.html?isd_sourc...
